body_html: Your build uses g++ even though you specified -DANDROID_TOOLCHAIN=clang, I think this is the origin of the problem. I'd suggest to check your environment variables, maybe you have CXX environment variable set to i686-linux-android-g++ path?
body_text: Your build uses g++ even though you specified -DANDROID_TOOLCHAIN=clang, I think this is the origin of the problem. I'd suggest to check your environment variables, maybe you have CXX environment variable set to i686-linux-android-g++ path?
body: Your build uses `g++` even though you specified `-DANDROID_TOOLCHAIN=clang`, I think this is the origin of the problem. I'd suggest to check your environment variables, maybe you have `CXX` environment variable set to `i686-linux-android-g++` path?
